name: Robo-Go
description:
Ikaruga x Sine Mora x Jetpack Joyride

a two-player one-button 'co-opetitive' endless runner...

The A button controls thrust. (Z and / on the keyboard).

Same coloured orbs move you forward.

The opposite colour pushes you back.

See how far both of you can survive.

Recommend using two Xbox 360 controllers.

Janice Scott - 2D Art

Gary Hui - 3D Art

Daniel Austin - Programming and personal rubber duck

George Mak - Design and Programming

Made for the AIE Sydney 2017 Second Year April game jam. The theme was One-Button.
